name: Bang Buster
description:
Philly Dev Night's August game jam theme was Oasis. Yes, the band as in Wonderwall and stuff. Our task was to pick a song title and use that as our theme. We chose Fuckin' in the Bushes which resulted is Bang Buster, a game where you play a security guard patrolling a park and is tasked with cracking down on public fornication. Avoid obstacles! Grab donut power-ups from seagulls! Smash the hearts and type out what's indicated to complete your tasks! Last two minutes to finish your shift and go into overtime for maximum points! Have fun!

CONTROLS

  • ARROW KEYS: Move
  • SPACE: Jump
  • KEYBOARD: Type

Built in Unity using Futile
by Chris Hoopes & Dustin Twilley
August, 2013
